duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitating the formation, learning, and growth of multiple cross-functional delivery teams in developing a Lean/Agile mindset.
Guiding teams and leaders to enable the effective flow of delivery across the end-to-end value stream.
Playing a key role in planning, facilitation, supporting teams, removing impediments, providing team coaching and mentorship.
Visualizing the Lean value stream to optimize for flow and working with other Lean/Agile practitioners to exchange learnings at scale.

education_certification.credential: Certifications: LeanKanban University's TKP, Scrum.org's PSM, Scrum Alliance's CSM
